.. _themes:

================
Supported themes
================

This project supports multiple themes such as:

|CI themes|

- sphinx_rtd_theme
- astropy_sphinx_theme
- alabaster
- sphinxdoc
- pyramid
- bizstyle
- traditional

.. |CI themes| image:: https://github.com/devanshshukla99/sphinx-versioned-docs/actions/workflows/CI-themes.yml/badge.svg
    :alt: CI themes
